About Me

I'm a passionate learner who loves innovation and teamwork. As a Computer Science undergraduate, I thrive on solving complex problems and creating meaningful solutions through technology.

Currently pursuing my degree at PVP Siddhartha Institute of Technology with a CGPA of 8.94, I'm dedicated to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends.

My journey in software development is driven by curiosity and a desire to build applications that make a positive impact on people's lives.
